moduleType().notice: Returns an enum that represents the type of security model encoded by this ISM.

verify(bytes,bytes).notice: Defines a security model responsible for verifying interchain messages based on the provided metadata.

params.gasAmount: The amount of destination gas paid for.
params.messageId: The ID of the message to pay for.
params.payment: The amount of native tokens paid.

GasPayment(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a payment is made for a message's gas costs.

userdoc.notice: Manages payments on a source chain to cover gas costs of relaying messages to destination chains.

moduleType().details: Relayers infer how to fetch and format metadata.

params._metadata: Off-chain metadata provided by a relayer, specific to the security model encoded by the module (e.g. validator signatures)

returns._0: True if the message was verified
